section.p: He tells a story a kindly old wizard who found a little dwarf asleep under a bush. He took the dwarf as his apprentice, but after only a month he woke up to find that the dwarf had stolen a suit of magic armour. This armour was empty but could still move and fight, because it contained an elfin ghost.
‘As long as the visor was never opened, the ghost could not escape, and it had to do whatever the dwarf wanted...’ the storyteller says to the children.
